subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The hit on Giants second baseman Marco Scutaro in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. brought back memories of last season’s collision that sidelined the star catcher Buster Posey.
snippet: The hit on Giants second baseman Marco Scutaro in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. brought back memories of last season’s collision that sidelined the star catcher Buster Posey.
